articles.author: taz-ali
articles.title: How British attitude towards Covid is driving soaring cases in UK compared to rest of Europe - iNews
articles.description: The UK’s seven-day average of daily Covid cases is about 680 per million, compared with just under 40 in Spain, 47 in Italy and 73 in France
articles.content: The British publics attitude towards the Covid pandemic changed dramatically after nearly all restrictions were lifted in July, which experts say has led to the incredibly high infection rate the cou… [+5665 chars]
